mapper.insert:
select shop_seq.nextval from dual
insert into shop(shopno,shop_name,shop_intro, businessno,account,image, forwarding, back, artistno) values(#{shopno},#{shopName},#{shopIntro},#{businessno},#{account},#{image},#{forwarding},#{back},#{artistno})
mapper.select: select shopno,shop_name shopName, shop_intro shopIntro, businessno, account from shop where shopno=#{shopno}
mapper.update:
update shop
shop_name=#{shopName}, shop_intro=#{shopIntro},
where shopno=#{shopno} and rownum=1
